data.name: TOHU - Digital Art Book
data.detailed_description:
TOHU is a brand new adventure game set amongst a world of weird and wonderful fish planets. Here in the Digital Art Book, you can chart the visual journey of the developers at Fireart Games, as they created this bizarre world and the cast of colourful characters that populates it.

Learn the conceptual origins of main characters The Girl and Cubus, and explore how TOHU’s wildly varied locations came to be, with in-depth developer commentary alongside behind-the-scenes imagery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 3.3 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) or Radeon R9 285 (2048 MB)
